snippet: The Thunder acquired Derek Fisher to provide some leadership to a young team, yet there he was Wednesday night, playing the entire fourth quarter as Oklahoma City eliminated the Spurs.
abstract: Harvey Araton On Basketball column asserts that Oklahoma City Thunder point guard Derek Fisher, veteran who was acquired from Los Angeles Lakers to provide leadership to the young team, has played an integral role in the team's playoff success.
lead_paragraph: The Thunder acquired Derek Fisher to provide some leadership to a young team, yet there he was Wednesday night, playing the entire fourth quarter as Oklahoma City eliminated the Spurs.

headline.seo: 2012 N.B.A. Playoffs - Thunder’s Derek Fisher Works His Way Into Another Finals
headline.main: Experienced Hand Points to the Finals
headline.print_headline: Experienced Hand Points to the Finals
